title: 澳門氣象局：今晚至明日初時考慮發出一號風球
news_content:
位於菲律賓以東的低壓區已增強為熱帶低氣壓，澳門氣象局預測這個熱帶氣旋今晚至明日初時進入澳門800公里範圍，屆時會考慮發出一號風球。

氣象局預料，該熱帶氣旋將逐漸增強，大致移向廣東東部沿海，由於移動路徑及強度仍然存在較大不確定性，會密切監測它的發展及移動方向。

title: 美卿晤卡塔爾國家元首討論以色列襲擊多哈事件的影響
news_content:
美國國務卿魯比奧到訪多哈，與卡塔爾國家元首塔米姆討論以色列上星期在多哈襲擊哈馬斯領導層的事件。

塔米姆的辦公室發表聲明，指雙方討論到襲擊的影響、未來透過聯合外交努力在加沙達成停火，以及以色列與哈馬斯互換被扣押人員的問題。

卡塔爾外交部發言人安薩里表示，兩人亦討論到國防合作事宜，以色列的襲擊加快兩國達成新的戰略防禦協議。

被問及襲擊事件後斡旋加沙停火的工作，安薩里表示，卡塔爾目前的重點是維護主權，在這個問題得到解決前，不會考慮其他問題。

美國國務院發言人皮戈特表示，魯比奧重申美國與卡塔爾之間牢固的雙邊關係，以及美國對卡塔爾安全與主權的堅定支持，又感謝多哈為結束加沙戰事和人質獲釋的努力。

title: 曼谷抵港男子涉嫌行李藏毒被捕
news_content:
海關昨日在機場偵破一宗行李藏毒的販毒案件，拘捕一名男子，檢獲約10公斤懷疑大麻花，市值約210萬元。

該名27歲男旅客昨日從曼谷飛抵本港，海關人員進行清關時，在他的手提背囊及手提袋內，發現懷疑大麻花藏於零食包裝袋內，隨即把他拘捕，案件仍在調查。

title: 美國9月NAHB房屋市場指數維持不變
news_content:

title: 健康160超額認購近751倍　一手中籤率8%

title: 涉未經註冊以牙醫身份執業　51歲女子被捕
news_content:
警方聯同相關政府部門採取聯合執法行動，在大角咀鐵樹街一個商場的店鋪，拘捕一名51歲女子，涉嫌「未經註冊而以牙醫身份執業」、「管有第1部毒藥」及「非法管有未經註冊藥劑製品」。警方說，經調查後證實這名女子並非註冊牙醫。

行動中，警方檢獲一批牙科工具和器材、儀器及懷疑麻醉藥物等。

涉案被捕女子已獲准保釋候查，須於10月下旬向警方報到。

title: 卓永興稱政府深化醫療體系改革　中醫藥發展值得期待
news_content:
政務司副司長卓永興表示，中醫藥發展今年特別值得期待，政府年底會發布香港首份《中醫藥發展藍圖》，香港首間中醫醫院也將於12月起分階段啟用，政府中藥檢測中心永久大樓今年12月啟用，亦會推動檢測科研、教育和國際交流等工作，呼籲業界積極參與12月舉行的「第七屆粵港澳大灣區中醫藥傳承創新發展大會」。

卓永興在醫療衞生界國慶酒會致辭說，國家在經濟、貿易、科技、基建、文化體育、軍事、外交等多個領域舉足輕重，就以經濟貿易而言，國家已是全球第二大經濟體、第一大工業國、第一大貨物貿易國和第一大外匯儲備國，這些成就令人無比自豪。

卓永興說，特區政府會繼續深化醫療體系改革，全面審視醫療體系的定位和目標，政府會支持本港醫院進行《國際醫院評審認證標準（中國）》評審認證，以持續提升醫療質量；也會努力發展香港成為國際醫療創新樞紐，藉改革藥械審批制度，提升本港臨床試驗能力，並善用河套區策略性位置，發揮好「一國兩制」優勢。

卓永興指出，現屆特區政府積極推行醫療改革，政府的「慢病共治計劃」自2023年11月推行至今，已有超過15萬市民參加計劃，其中完成篩查的逾9萬人中，約有四成被診斷為血糖偏高、或患有糖尿病、高血壓或高血脂，認為推動基層醫療，不僅能更有效守護和促進市民健康，也能減輕疾病對醫療系統和社會造成的負擔。

title: Two arrested on suspicion of selling fake mooncakes
news_content:
Customs officers on Tuesday said two people were arrested on suspicion of selling counterfeit mooncakes and other fake goods worth about HK$1 million.

In an operation that began on August 27 – ahead of the Mid-Autumn Festival – officers seized 170 boxes of suspected counterfeit mooncakes, as well as more than 3,700 suspected counterfeit items, including apparel, accessories, Chinese medicines, perfumes, cosmetics and skincare products. 

Customs authorities also found that suspected counterfeit mooncakes were on sale at some local shops during spot checks. 

The operation was ongoing and officers have not ruled out further arrests.

title: 陳茂波稱區域經濟發展和科技變革為會計界帶來廣闊發展空間與機遇
news_content:
財政司司長陳茂波在特許公認會計師公會香港分會晚宴致辭時表示，當前全球在應對氣候變化方面，面對種種挑戰，個別國家甚至出現承諾倒退的情況，但中國依然堅定推進綠色轉型與可持續發展，認為這是不可逆轉的歷史潮流，相信隨著企業、投資者、監管機構對環境、社會和企業管治(ESG)資訊的重視日增，會計專業的價值與影響力亦將提升。他認為，無論是區域經濟的發展、科技的變革，還是綠色和可持續發展的推進，均為會計界帶來廣闊的發展空間與多元化發展機遇，是一個必須把握的風起雲湧時代。
　　 
陳茂波說，地緣政治令多邊自由貿易體制轉向區域性的經濟發展，區域內經濟體以共同利益深化協作，而區域與區域之間則可能出現更多貿易壁壘、存在更大的競爭；同時越來越多內地企業加快「走出去」的步伐，積極在全球布局供應鏈、產業鏈，此舉是用好自身在內地的產能，同時又參與國際產業分工與合作，這過程讓香港的會計師可以一展身手。

陳茂波提到，人工智能的快速發展正以前所未有的速度重塑各行各業，會計行業亦不例外，業界需要把握這工具，思考如何更多地參與高增值、AI難以取替的職能，因此提升數碼素養、擁抱科技轉型、確保服務質素、誠信與堅守專業操守，已成為會計師持續學習與發展的核心要素。

title: Observatory to consider issuing T1 from Wed night
news_content:
The Observatory said it will consider issuing the Standby Signal No. 1 between Wednesday night and early Thursday as a tropical depression is expected to enter within 800 kilometres of Hong Kong.

The forecaster said the tropical depression will move across the vicinity of Luzon on Tuesday and Wednesday, and is expected to move in the general direction of the coast of Guangdong and intensify gradually. 

The Observatory said there are still uncertainties in its movement and intensity due to the influence of the northeast monsoon. 

"As its circulation is relatively small, the tropical cyclone will only bring significant impact to local weather when it gets relatively close to Hong Kong," the Observatory said. 

The forecaster added that it will access the need for issuing higher signals on Friday. 

It said the weather will become unsettled on Friday, with stronger winds along with showers and squally thunderstorms over the weekend.

title: 海關檢獲約170盒懷疑冒牌月餅
news_content:
海關檢獲約170盒懷疑冒牌月餅及超過3700件懷疑冒牌物品，包括服飾、配件、中成藥、香水、化妝品及護膚品，估計市值約100萬元，拘捕兩人。

海關早前在屯門內河船碼頭海關驗貨場抽查一個從內地抵港，報稱載有汽車零件的40呎貨櫃，檢獲約96盒懷疑冒牌月餅及約1千件懷疑冒牌物品。根據初步調查顯示，該批懷疑冒牌月餅將會轉口至海外地區。

另外，海關在市面巡查期間發現有零售店鋪售賣懷疑冒牌月餅。於商標持有人協助下，關員採取執法行動，突擊搜查兩間零售店鋪，檢獲約74盒懷疑冒牌月餅及約2700件懷疑冒牌物品。

行動中，海關共拘捕兩名涉案人士，不排除會有更多人被捕。海關說，中秋節將至，會繼續加強巡查和執法，打擊不同售賣冒牌物品活動。

title: HK reports another imported chikungunya fever case
news_content:
Hong Kong on Tuesday recorded one more imported case of chikungunya fever, bringing this year's total to 18. 

The Centre for Health Protection (CHP) said the latest patient is a 39-year-old woman who lives in Kowloon City district and travelled to Jiangmen in Guangdong province from September 7 to 9. 

After returning to Hong Kong, she developed a fever and joint pain on Monday and sought medical treatment at Queen Elizabeth Hospital.

The woman is in stable condition in hospital.

The CHP added that 10 household contacts are asymptomatic and under medical surveillance.

title: 影星羅拔烈福逝世　享年89歲
news_content:
荷里活知名影星和導演羅拔烈福逝世，享年89歲。

美國傳媒報道，羅拔烈福當地星期二在猶他州聖丹斯家中離世，家人陪伴在則。

羅拔烈福在洛杉磯出生，上世紀50年代開始登台演出，之後在電視展開演藝生涯。主演的電影《驚天大陰謀》、《老千計狀元才》、《俏郎君》等，叫好又叫座。

羅拔烈福演而優則導，1981年憑電影《普通人》贏得奧斯卡最佳導演。他亦支持獨立電影，1978年創立「辛丹斯電影節」。2002年獲頒奧斯卡終身成就獎。他2018年息影，最後一部作品是喜劇《老人與槍》。

8月進口物價按月升幅輕微加快至0.3%，市場原先預期會跌0.1%；按年則零增長。

title: 3歲女童染甲型流感併發嚴重肺炎　目前仍留醫情況嚴重
news_content:
一名有長期病患的3歲女童患上甲型流感併發嚴重肺炎，目前仍然留醫，情況嚴重。

女童昨日開始出現發燒、咳嗽和氣促，同日到瑪麗醫院急症室求醫，其後被安排到該院兒童深切治療部留醫。她的鼻咽拭子樣本經化驗後，證實對甲型流感呈陽性反應。
  
衞生防護中心調查發現，患者的一名家居接觸者上周曾感染甲型流感，求醫後毋須入院。女童沒有接種2024/25季度流感疫苗，就讀的學校近日沒有出現流感爆發的情況。

中心說，本港現時處於夏季流感季節，學校或院舍的流感樣疾病爆發個案近兩周大幅上升。截至昨日，涉及學校的爆發個案共有104宗，包括14宗為幼稚園或幼兒中心、56宗來自小學，34宗是中學。

title: 天文台考慮明晚至周四初時發一號信號　評估周五是否須發更高信號
news_content:
天文台表示，位於呂宋附近的低壓區已增強為熱帶低氣壓，會在今明兩日橫過呂宋一帶並進入本港800公里範圍，會考慮在明晚至星期四初時發出一號戒備信號。

天文台預料，該熱帶氣旋會大致移向廣東沿岸並逐漸增強，但受東北季候風影響，它的路徑及強度存在變數。由於其環流較為細小，要在較為接近香港時，才會為本地天氣帶來顯著影響，天文台會視乎該熱帶氣旋的強度、其強風區與本港的距離及本地風力變化，評估是否需要在星期五改發更高熱帶氣旋警告信號。

天文台亦說，受其相關的外圍雨帶影響，星期五本港天氣漸轉不穩定，週末期間有驟雨及狂風雷暴，風勢較大，海有湧浪。

title: 本港新增一宗基孔肯雅熱輸入個案　患者住紅磡早前曾到江門
news_content:
本港新增一宗基孔肯雅熱個案，患者是一名39歲女子，住在紅磡曲街，她本月7日至9日獨自到訪廣東省江門市。

衞生防護中心表示，患者昨日開始出現發燒和關節痛，到伊利沙伯醫院求醫，並獲安排入院在無蚊環境下接受治療，目前情況穩定。她的血液樣本經檢驗後，證實對基孔肯雅熱病毒呈陽性反應。她的10名家居接觸者，現時沒有出現病徵，正接受醫學監察。

中心說，由於病人於潛伏期曾身處江門市，認為她是在外遊期間受到感染，屬輸入個案，中心會繼續進行流行病學調查，並已把個案通報廣東省衞生當局。本港今年累計錄得18宗基孔肯雅熱確診個案，全部屬輸入個案。

title: 財庫局：香港與沙特金融領域合作不斷加強
news_content:
財經事務及庫務局在社交平台發文指，副局長陳浩濂近日出訪沙特阿拉伯利雅得，出席當地舉辦的金融科技盛事—Money 20/20中東大會，標誌著香港與沙特金融領域合作不斷加強。他介紹了香港在數字資產上最新發展。

陳浩濂表示，香港積極擁抱以區塊鏈開發更具成本效益、兼融、靈活和劃時代嶄新金融創新潛力，以「相同業務、相同風險、相同規則」的原則，一方面讓數字資產創新在香港可持續地蓬勃發展，另一方面按照國際標準，管理金融穩定、消費者保障和打擊洗錢及恐怖分子資金籌集方面的實際和潛在風險。

陳浩濂出訪期間與當地多名官員會面，包括保險監管局行政總裁Naji Al-Tamimi、投資促進局行政總裁Khalid Al Khattaf等，談到推動兩地保險公司合作、加強保險監管知識交流及能力建設，以及以香港金融服務和會計專業，促進沙特和亞洲市場雙向投資等。

陳浩濂在沙特期間亦與不同銀行、金融科技公司和家族辦公室見面，討論透過香港投資亞洲市場和發展亞洲業務，或利用香港金融平台促成與亞洲企業跨境交易和合作項目。香港可於債券融資、私募投資等方面發揮作用，為沙特和亞洲市場有潛力的項目籌集資金，同時為香港金融服務業帶來更多商機。

title: 中國海警驅離闖黃岩島菲律賓公務船事件　菲方指一人受傷
news_content:
中國海警用水炮驅離非法闖入黃岩島領海的菲律賓公務船事件。菲律賓海岸警衛隊表示，菲方船隻駛到黃岩島以東約4海里時，遭中國海警發射水炮攻擊，其中一艘菲方巡邏艦船玻璃窗碎裂、船身隔板受損，最少一名菲律賓漁業和水產資源局人員被玻璃割傷。

海警新聞發言人較早時表示，菲律賓組織10多艘公務船從不同方向非法侵闖中國黃岩島領海，中國海警依法管制並驅離菲方船隻，其中一艘菲律賓公務船危險機動、故意衝撞中方正常執法的海警船，危及中方船隻和人員安全，中國海警依法採取管控措施，現場操作專業規範、正當合法。

title: 中宣部原副部長張建春因受賄一審判囚14年
news_content:
中央宣傳部原副部長張建春受賄案，河北省廊坊市中級人民法院一審公開宣判，對被告人張建春以受賄罪判處有期徒刑14年，並處罰金400萬元人民幣；對張建春受賄所得及孳息依法予以追繳，上繳國庫。

經審理查明，2004年至2024年，被告人張建春利用擔任中央組織部副部長，中央宣傳部副部長等職務上的便利，以及職權、地位形成的便利條件，為有關單位和個人在項目推進、業務承攬、工作安排、職務調整等事項上提供幫助，直接或者通過他人非法收受有關單位和個人給予的財物，共計價值超過5506萬元人民幣。張建春當庭表示認罪悔罪。人大代表、政協委員和各界群眾50多人旁聽了庭審。

title: 全球創新指數香港排名升三位　政府稱全力推動香港成國際創科中心
news_content:
世界知識產權組織公布2025年《全球創新指數》，香港在全球139個經濟體中排名上升三位至第15位，並在亞洲保持第五位。

在《創新指數》下的兩個副指數中，香港在「創新投入」排名上升至全球第八位，在「創新產出」的排名躍升九位至第22位。至於分支柱領域方面，香港在「信貸」高踞全球第一位，並在「高等教育」、「知識的吸收」、「信息通信技術」等多個領域躋身全球前十名。

政府發言人表示，樂見香港在《創新指數》下取得良好進展，在多個分支柱領域都取得領先的排名，充分顯示香港具備優越條件，在創新路上不斷邁步向前，強調加速推動創新科技發展是特區政府的施政重點，會持續完善創科生態圈，聚集全球創科資源和人才，全力推動香港發展成為國際創科中心。

title: 有議員憂加入網約車令的士難以生存　陳美寶稱帶來良性競爭
news_content:
立法會有關網約車服務條例草案委員會召開首次會議。草案提出，網約車申領牌照和續牌時，車齡需要低於12年。選委界陳紹雄表示，網約車平台歡迎措施，但的士車隊車齡限制為3年，擔心造成不公，關注如何平衡兩者的營運環境，達至多帆並舉。

航運交通界易志明說，現時晚上的士業界生意慘淡，擔心日後加上網約車，業界將難以生存，問到會否限制網約車在部分時段營運。

運輸及物流局局長陳美寶表示，政府將制訂網約車總量限制，避免車輛太多過於密集，但同時需要兼顧市民召喚網約車的體驗，維持方便性，又說相信引入規管網約車，已較現行做法更嚴謹，有助為整體點對點交通服務帶來良性競爭，對的士業界營運亦有幫助，市民有更多選擇。

新民黨何敬康關注，會否有空間容許登記車主的直系親屬駕駛網約車，陳美寶說，理解出發點可能希望提高網約車的運力，但擔心如果再擴闊可以提供服務的界線，涉及的情況會更多更複雜，因此希望有序落實，暫時不傾向容許車輛綁定登記車主以外的司機。

民建聯陳恒鑌問到，市民如何識別車輛和司機已申領牌照；如果有車輛申領牌照後，實質未有提供服務，導致出現「疆屍牌」，政府如何監管。陳美寶說，提供網約車服務的車輛必須展示標識，方便市民識別，又相信平台會持續檢視相關數據，了解旗下車輛和司機出行模式和運力，亦有助部門日後監管。

title: 林慧虹：香港是家辦起步及擴張理想地方
news_content:
滙豐香港區行政總裁林慧虹表示，樂見政府提前完成吸引200間家族辦公室來港落戶或擴展業務的目標，認為家辦投資在房地產、私募股權、風險投資等領域，比機構投資者更具耐心，她形容是推動經濟發展的強大引擎。

她認為，香港是家辦起步及擴張的理想地方，包括透明度高的營商環境、稅務優惠和法律體系均具優勢，同時香港聯通內地市場，其他城市無法取代。

林慧虹出席澳洲會計師公會一個論壇時提到，內地現時擁有22萬億美元儲蓄，正在尋求投資方向。本港股市交投約27%來自內地資金，單在今年上半年南向資金流入已超越去年全年，反映內地投資需求龐大，未來需進一步拓展互聯互通機制，同時隨著人工智能、虛擬資產、代幣化等領域發展，需要政策支持吸納更多人才。

Hospitality trade upbeat with National Day holiday
news_content:
Leaders from the hospitality sector on Tuesday are projecting a vibrant and successful National Day Golden Week, fuelled by its convergence with the Mid-Autumn Festival and a packed schedule of signature events.

The Travel Industry Council predicts that 1.5 million mainlanders will travel to the SAR during the eight-day holiday, representing a 10 percent increase from last year, when the Golden Week was seven days. 

The council's executive director, Fanny Yeung, said the signature major events across the city are expected to attract significant crowds. 

"First of all, we have the fireworks. Fireworks with our Victoria Harbour behind as a background, I think that is the most spectacular scene for our visitors," she said.

"Other than that, because this year, the Mid-Autumn Festival is also falling into the Golden Week time, so we have a Unesco fire dragon [dance] in Tai Hang. That will be a consecutive three-day event."

The council estimates 1,300 tour groups will arrive with 45,000 visitors, accounting for 3 percent of total mainland arrivals.

The projected number of tour group visitors would also mark a 10 percent increase from a year ago.

The positive outlook is echoed by Caspar Tsui, executive director of the Federation of Hong Kong Hotel Owners, who reported strong booking momentum, with visitors planning trips earlier than last year. 

He noted a shift in priorities, with travellers now seeking immersive trips and unique cultural experiences over traditional shopping and food packages.

"They're willing to spend as long as the experiential is up to their standard in value. In Hong Kong, I think for National Day, we have a lot of offerings. From Kai Tak to West Kowloon to horse racing tourism, these are all new," he said.

"But not to mention our core Victoria Harbour, the fireworks and all the cultural and historical sites and theme parks, they are still very attractive. The important thing is we need to promote it so that the tourists are aware of what they can do in Hong Kong."

The government has announced that various sectors will launch National Day celebrations and promotions, including half-price cinema tickets, free tram and select ferry rides and discounts at major attractions.

Looking ahead, Tsui emphasised that continued collaboration involving industry stakeholders and government initiatives is crucial to further solidify Hong Kong's position as a premier global travel destination.

The robust recovery of the tourism sector is further underscored by the latest figures from the Hong Kong Tourism Board. 

The city has provisionally recorded 5.15 million visitor arrivals in August, a 16 percent year-on-year increase and the highest monthly total since the pandemic. 

From January to August, Hong Kong welcomed approximately 33 million visitors, a 12 percent increase, with strong growth from the mainland and other key markets including Taiwan, South Korea, Japan and Australia.

title: Govt to change taxi driver tests in November
news_content:
Transport minister Mabel Chan said on Tuesday that the authorities will introduce new written tests for taxi drivers in November, with more content aimed at improving service quality. 

The government has tabled a bill to regulate rail-hailing services, with their drivers required to take the same exams as those in the taxi trade.

At a bills committee in the legislature, the secretary for transport and logistics told lawmakers that the new tests are a response to demands from the taxi trade, and she hopes the tests will help bring new blood to the industry.

"We will make improvements to the tests such as adding more questions to do with enhancing taxi service quality," Chan said.

"At the same time, we are responding to public demands by significantly reducing and simplifying questions to do with locations and routes."

The bill would also cap the age of vehicles used for ride-hailing at 12 years, up from the seven years initially proposed by the government.

Election Committee sector lawmaker Chan Siu-hung said some taxi operators find this unfair.

He noted that vehicles used in new taxi fleets that started operating in March can only be three years old at most. 

Mable Chan said in response that regulating ride-hailing services can bring positive competition.

"We're moving from the current lack of regulation to a stringent regulatory framework," she said.

"I think from this point of view, our regulation should provide greater operational clarity for the taxi industry."

The minister stressed that the framework will allow all parties in the door-to-door service ecosystem to co-exist and complement each other.

Transport sector lawmaker Frankie Yick cited government figures as showing that only a small amount of people use ride-hailing services.

He questioned whether the convenience such services provide users will come at the expense of other people, being as more vehicles on the roads will worsen traffic jams. 

The transport minister noted that Hong Kong plans to cap the number of ride-hailing vehicles, unlike many other places, given the road constraints and traffic volumes. 

She said the government hopes the bill will be passed before Legco's term ends in around a month's time.

title: 分析料亞洲股市在美國減息後將借勢調整　但調整幅度有限
news_content:
憧憬美國恢復減息，日韓台股市近期持續創新高。日經指數單日升0.3%，連續4日創新高；韓股及台股單日同樣升逾1%，台灣加權指數收報25629點，首爾綜合指數收報3449點，連升11個交易日，累計升近1成，創6年來最長升浪。

獨立投資策略師陳俊文指，韓股近期受惠當地放棄提高資本增值稅，日股則因為經濟數據理想，以及憧憬下任首相推出利好市場措施。他認為，美國恢復減息0.25厘的機會大，若加上議息聲明偏鴿，暗示會繼續減息，將有利股市前景，但在美國重新減息後，區內股市會借勢稍為調整，但相信調整幅度有限，未至於出現轉勢。

韓股今年以來累計升近44%，升幅迫近內地的創業板指數，日股及台股年內已升1成以上。

陳俊文認為，全年計，韓股及創業板指數有機會繼續在區內股市升幅靠前，但要留意韓股急升後在高位有獲利壓力，創業板則要留意第4季會否有措施抑制炒風。

title: 現貨金貼近每盎司3700美元　有分析員關注黃金已超買
news_content:
美元疲弱帶動金價再創新高，現貨金逼近每盎司3700美元。

市場預期聯儲局將減息0.25厘，美元指數在議息前夕跌向97邊緣，創逾兩個月低位。

獨立外匯商品分析師盧楚仁認為，金價升勢受到美元偏弱、環球央行繼續買金、歐洲地緣政局緊張等避險因素帶動。他又指，匯市交投淡靜，未見明確方向，令匯市資金流向金市。

他不排除金價短期或上試3750美元，但市場關注聯儲局主席鮑威爾議息後的言論，要注意黃金已嚴重超買，後市金價或調整至3450美元水平。

title: 商務部：加強財政金融支持服務消費　有序擴大單方面免簽國家範圍
news_content:
商務部聯同多個部門發布有關擴大服務消費的文件，指出服務消費是促進民生改善重要支撐，亦是消費轉型升級重要方向，在推動經濟高質量發展發揮重要作用。商務部會牽頭完善支持政策，更大力度提振消費、擴大內需，亦會加強財政金融支持。

文件提出，統籌利用地方政府專項債券等各資金渠道，支持符合條件的文化、旅遊、養老、托育、體育等服務設施建設；引導社會資本加大對服務消費相關領域投資；對服務業經營主體給予財政貼息支持，推動降低融資成本，激發市場活力。

當局指，綜合運用貨幣信貸等政策工具，支持金融機構擴大服務消費領域信貸投放，合理確定貸款利率水平，可持續支持服務消費。同時亦加大消費信貸支持力度，支持地方透過新設或納入現有風險補償專項資金等方式，開展重點領域消費貸款貼息，形成「政府補貼+金融支持+商家優惠」組合拳。

另外，為吸引更多境外人員入境消費，將有序擴大單方面免簽國家範圍，優化完善區域性入境免簽政策，持續優化外國人來華簽證政策及通訊、住宿、支付等便利化措施，為更多符合條件的人員簽發5年多次簽證。文件提出，加強內地文旅資源的國際宣傳推廣，鼓勵旅行社及旅遊平台推出適合外國人的特色旅遊路線；並加強「留學中國」品牌建設；培育面向國際的醫療及會展等市場。

title: 國防部：中方始終根據國家安全和裝備技術發展需要推進航母建設
news_content:
在北京，國防部新聞發言人蔣斌表示，中國第三艘航空母艦福建艦日前通過台灣海峽，前往南海相關海域開展試驗訓練任務，是航母建造過程中的正常安排，符合相關國際法和國際實踐，不針對任何特定國家和目標。 

蔣斌指出，中國堅持走和平發展道路，奉行防禦性國防政策，中方始終根據國家安全和裝備技術發展需要推進航母建設。福建艦作為大國重器，必將為捍衛國家主權、安全、發展利益發揮應有作用。

title: 商務部提出探索設置中小學春秋假　增加旅遊出行等服務消費時間
news_content:
商務部聯同多個部門發布有關擴大服務消費的文件提到，優化學生假期安排，完善配套政策。

文件提出，在放假總日數及教學時間總量保持不變之下，鼓勵有條件的地方，結合氣候條件、生產安排、職工帶薪休假制度落實等因素，調整每學年的教學及放假時間，探索設置中小學春秋假，相應縮短寒暑假時間，增加旅遊出行等服務消費時間。

另外，當局指，有條件的地方可結合實際對普惠托育機構給予場地支持及適當營運補助，培育多元化教育及培訓市場。同時亦提出，加快推進長期護理保險制度建設，擴大長期護理保險制度覆蓋面，包括開展家政服務職業技能專項培訓等。

title: 全球創新指數香港升三位至第15位　陳茂波：香港發展策略正確
news_content:
世界知識產權組織公布的2025年《全球創新指數》中，香港在全球排名上升三位，升至第15位，並在亞洲保持第5位。

在139個被評核的經濟體中，香港在多個分項表現突出，例如在支持創新的優勢中，香港在「信貸」排全球第1位，並在多個領域躋身全球前10名，包括「高等教育」、「知識的吸收」、「信息通信技術」、「制度環境」和「投資」。數據亦顯示，香港的研發總開支和研究人員數目持續上升。

財政司司長陳茂波在社交專頁說，這次排名顯示香港推動「金融＋創科」雙互促進的發展策略，是正確的方向。善用香港全鏈條的籌融資功能優勢，加上港投公司作為「耐心資本」，更好引導和槓桿市場力量加快創科的發展和突破。他又說，特區政府大力推廣香港「一國兩制」下包容多元的文化、頂尖的高等院校和國際大都會的生活環境，讓香港更好集聚國際高端人才，支持基礎科研、成果轉化和產業群聚。

陳茂波指出，香港聯同深圳、廣州等大灣區城市已是全球第一的創新集群，大家攜手並進、優勢互補，繼續推進大灣區成為世界一流的國際創科樞紐，貢獻國家科技自立自強，同時為香港經濟多元發展創造更多新空間。

title: 內地推19項措施擴大服務消費　開展促消費活動及優化景區預約等
news_content:
商務部等9個部門發布《關於擴大服務消費的若干政策措施》，涉及的19項措施當中，包括印發《服務消費提質惠民行動工作方案》，加強政策支持、優化消費環境等，並提出開展「服務消費季」系列促消費活動，培育服務消費品牌，打造服務消費熱點；支持優質消費資源與知名IP跨界合作，打造一批商旅文體健融合的消費新場景，培育一批新型消費龍頭企業。

措施提出，因地制宜延長熱門文博場館及景區營業時間，優化預約方式；支持有條件的地方，以優質演藝、動漫、遊戲、影視作品等線上流量，帶動線下場景創新；鼓勵引進國外優秀體育賽事，支持地方舉辦大眾體育賽事等。

其他措施包括擴大服務業高水平對外開放，推動互聯網及文化等領域有序開放，擴大電信、醫療、教育等領域開放試點，加快推進服務業擴大開放綜合試點示範；放寬中高端醫療、休閒度假等領域的市場准入等。

title: 本月第二批白紋伊蚊誘蚊器指數　18個監察地區指數在10%以下
news_content:
食環署公布本月第二批18個監察地區的白紋伊蚊誘蚊器指數，涵蓋12個監察地區的第一階段誘蚊器指數及6個監察地區的分區誘蚊器指數，全部都在10%以下。

食環署至今已公布本月共兩批白紋伊蚊誘蚊器指數，涵蓋共32個監察地區。與上月的分區白紋伊蚊誘蚊器指數相比，32個監察區中，26個監察地區的指數下跌或保持不變，代表蚊患情況改善或維持低水平；另有6區的指數輕微上升，但指數低於10%。

title: 運輸署關注鐵枝插穿城巴事故並要求營辦商就駕駛者未能致電交報告
news_content:
城巴昨日發生罕見意外，一輛由金鐘往天水圍的967號線巴士，當駛至青朗公路時，被一條外來鐵枝擊中車頭擋風玻璃，插進駕駛位置，司機受輕傷，留院治理。城巴指金屬枝長超過1米，初步調查懷疑被其他途徑的車輛輾起而擊中巴士。運輸署表示，非常關注事故，因可能涉及有司機未有確保負載物適當固定在車上，警方現正跟進調查。

運輸署亦非常關注有駕駛者致電隧道營辦商電話，但未能接通的情況，已要求營辦商立即調查及提交報告。隧道營辦商調查顯示，早前因電話系統故障未能接聽來電，已緊急維修，電話系統於今早近9時恢復正常。⁠⁠運輸署已責成營辦商必須與相關部門妥善做好隧道緊急事故的準備和應變，確保良好管理，政府會詳細審視營辦商的報告內容並嚴肅跟進。

隧道營辦商「交通基建管理有限公司」回覆查詢時說，經調查後發現事故發生地點在大欖隧道範圍以外，公司昨日早上曾檢查系統，處於正常。不過，調查發現，對話錄音裝置的轉駁機制失靈，導致外部來電無法轉駁至隧道人員接聽。經緊急維修，系統今早復常。對今次事件造成的不便致歉，將繼續致力確保隧道使用者道路安全及交通暢順，全力應對道路上任何突發事件。

title: 農業農村部：國家糧食安全有充分保障
news_content: 農業農村部回顧國家「十四五」規劃工作，指去年全國糧食產量首次突破1.4萬億斤，已經做到穀物基本自給，形容國家糧食安全有充分保障；又指「十四五」時期農民收入保持較快增長，但脫貧地區底子仍然較薄弱，要堅持結合開發式與兜底式幫扶工作，長久守住不發生規模性返貧致貧的底線。

title: 多名準新人未能聯絡星薈到酒樓了解　要求交代事件及退款
news_content:
多名準新人早前向尖沙咀婚宴酒家「星薈」，各支付5至10萬酒席訂金，但近日未能聯絡到酒樓負責人，擔心要重新找婚宴場地。他們下午到「星薈」了解情況，又促請公司盡快交代事件及處理退款。

有準新人表示，原定11月底結婚，已支付10萬元酒席訂金，擔心要另覓場地，又指酒樓方面並無主動聯絡交代事件，批評是不負責任。有苦主已向海關及消委會舉報，表示酒樓自8月中開始，已沒有營業，經理當時解釋正值淡季，因生意欠佳而暫時停業。

消委會表示，截至昨日下午5時，共接獲6宗有關尖沙咀「星薈」的投訴，涉及總金額49萬4000元，最高金額的 1宗涉及10萬9000元。

title: 馬時亨：將邀請中東及東盟代表來港參與明年論壇及峰會
news_content:
貿發局主席馬時亨表示，自從美國總統特朗普公布對等關稅以來，世界發生巨變，香港亦不例外受到影響，但他指，目前仍有很多來自內地及歐美等全球各地的資金流入香港市場。

馬時亨出席澳洲會計師公會的一個論壇時透露，貿發局將於明年1月和6月舉行亞洲金融論壇（AFF）和海灣阿拉伯國家合作委員會（GCC）峰會，邀請中東、東盟的代表來港參與，展示香港作為超級聯絡人的角色。

他又指，上周在港舉辦的「一帶一路高峰論壇」，吸引逾70個國家或地區代表出席，而東盟現時是香港最大貿易夥伴，香港與中東等地區的合作亦越來越密切，內地亦宣布對多個非洲國家免徵關稅，認為中國是世界穩定的力量。

title: Tax relief set as Portugal drops HK from its blacklist
news_content:
Secretary for Financial Services and the Treasury Christopher Hui said on Tuesday Hong Kong investors in Portugal will no longer be subject to higher taxes – as the city is set to be removed from its "blacklist of tax havens" from the start of next year. 

The news of the imminent move came after the SAR urged Portugal to take the city off the blacklist "in light of the city's continuous efforts in supporting global cooperation".

Hui also raised such concerns when he met with Portuguese officials to exchange views over global tax cooperation and mutual investments in a trip to Lisbon in June last year.

Currently, Hong Kong is included in Portugal's "tax haven list", meaning that Hong Kong enterprises and investors will face increased taxation and special anti-abuse measures in Portugal.

But following the removal, Hui noted that SAR investors and businesses can see their property taxes in Portugal decline by up to 7.2 percent while enjoying certain waivers for non-resident capital gains taxes – with potential savings amounting up to 28 percent.

Transactions between Hong Kong and Portugal will also no longer be subject to strict transfer pricing rules, he added.

"We will continue to support international tax cooperation, maintain close communication with overseas tax jurisdictions, and actively expand the network of tax treaties to further consolidate Hong Kong's position as an international leading business and investment hub," he said.

Along with the SAR, Liechtenstein and Uruguay will also no longer be on the list, with the removal set to take effect from January 1.

In February last year, the city was also removed from the European Union's watch list on tax cooperation, which Hui said demonstrated the efforts that the city had taken to comply with international tax standards and address concerns emanating from Brussels.

title: 在岸人民幣兌美元高收65點子　創近10個半月新高
news_content:
在岸人民幣收市報7.1163兌1美元，較昨日收市價升65點子，創近10個半月新高。

有交易員指，市場鞏固對聯儲局本周重新減息的預期，美元指數跌至97附近，支撐人民幣反彈。

title: 陳茂波稱本港金融市場成資金避風港　體現一國兩制下本港獨特優勢
news_content:
財政司司長陳茂波表示，地緣政治局勢和保護主義抬頭，加上持續的地區衝突造成嚴重人道主義危機，加劇世界的不確定性和挑戰，但仍然存在希望。他認為，區域合作出現新勢頭，區域貿易協定持續擴大，多邊組織正持續增強，建立具彈性和面向未來的夥伴關係。

陳茂波在一項活動致辭說，人工智能正展現巨大潛力，發展速度遠超預期，當美國正專注於大規模投資和前沿研究，國家開發的DeepSeek方案優先考慮成本效益、共融性和現實世界的應用。

陳茂波提到，世界正迅速演變，面對全球動蕩局勢，國際和內地投資者正重新發掘香港的價值和獨特性，本港的金融市場已成為國際資金的避風港，反映內地和國際投資者正對香港重抬信心，亦體現出香港在一國兩制下的獨特優勢。

陳茂波又指，隨著國家科技創新持續發展，並推動高質量雙向開放，越來越多內地企業利用香港作為國際化擴張和管理供應鏈的跳板，包括充分利用香港的資本市場、世界級專業服務、人才和國際網絡。

title: Sino-US concerns weigh on Hang Seng Index
news_content:
Mainland and Hong Kong shares were largely flat in choppy trading on Tuesday as investors grappled with uncertainty over the future of Sino-US relations.

The benchmark Hang Seng Index ended down eight points, or 0.03 percent, at 26,438 while the tech index added 0.6 percent.

On the mainland, the benchmark Shanghai Composite Index inched up 0.04 percent to 3,861 while the Shenzhen Component Index was slightly better, rising 0.45 percent to 13,063.

The combined turnover of these two indexes stood at 2.34 trillion yuan, expanding from 2.28 trillion yuan on Monday.

Stocks related to the robot and logistics industries led gains while shares in pork and non-ferrous metals saw big declines.

The ChiNext Index, tracking China's Nasdaq-style board of growth enterprises, gained 0.68 percent to close at 3,087.

Sentiment was cautious as investors weighed uncertainties around US-China trade talks. Officials from both countries said on Monday that they have reached a framework deal on TikTok pending confirmation in a Friday call between President Xi Jinping and his US counterpart Donald Trump.

That follows China's accusation that Nvidia violated the country's anti-monopoly law on Monday.

"Stock indexes are likely to remain range-bound in the short term" as markets focus on Sino-US trade talks and the Federal Reserve's meeting later this week, Nanhua Futures analysts said in a note to clients.

However, downside risks should be limited, they added, citing strong global market performance boosting risk appetite and continued loose liquidity conditions.

"Sino-US talks reduce near-term geopolitical risk but do not address structural growth challenges," Gary Tan, portfolio manager at Allspring Global Investments, said.

Policy and liquidity should continue to provide near-term support to the market, but structural challenges persist, and the firm maintains its underweight position on China, he added. (Reuters/Xinhua)

title: 旅議會料十一黃金周150萬內地客訪港　酒店業冀入住率逾九成
news_content:
十一黃金周將至，旅遊業議會表示，因應今年黃金周假期較去年多一日，加上預期內地訪客增加，預計整體內地訪客數字達150萬，高於去年約122萬人次。內地入境旅行團方面，預計有1300團，約有4萬5000人，佔整體內地客數字3%。酒店業主聯會預計，黃金周期間的旅遊旺區酒店需求高，入住率有望超過九成。

旅遊業議會總幹事楊淑芬表示，黃金周期間，香港節目豐富，包括有國慶煙花匯演等，屆時亦有一系列優惠，加上適逢中秋節，將有大坑舞火龍非遺活動舉行，相信會吸引旅客訪港。

因應十一國慶假期及10月7日中秋節翌日假期，楊淑芬預計在10月2日至4日期間為出境小高峰，以短途行程為主。

對於8月初步訪港旅客數字按年升16%，達515萬，創疫後單月新高。楊淑芬表示，疫情前後的旅客模式完全改變，不認為要追求疫前的訪港客量水平，應追求旅客在香港的體驗質量。她說，疫情前的旅客比例中，八成為內地旅客，兩成來自海外市場，而近期內地旅客佔比減少至七成半。

旅遊界立法會議員姚柏良表示，本港旅遊業正穩步復蘇，加上將有全運會等活動舉行，預期今年第四季旅客數字不俗。

title: Free tram, ferry rides to headline Oct 1 celebrations
news_content:
Cinemas will offer half-price tickets and rides on trams and several ferries will be free on October 1 as part of National Day celebrations, Chief Executive John Lee announced on Tuesday. 

The free ferry trips will apply to services between Tsim Sha Tsui and Central, North Point and Hung Hom, as well as North Point and Kowloon City.   

Additionally, passengers with birthdays on October 1 can enjoy free rides on three other ferry routes. 

In announcing the celebration plans, Lee said more than 1,000 restaurants and shops will be offering special promotions to enhance the festive atmosphere.  

"I thank the community for the enthusiastic response and hope that more businesses and organisations will participate, offering rich and diverse activities and offers to celebrate National Day," he said. 

More than 100 malls will provide various shopping and parking discounts, the CE added.

The MTR will distribute 76,000 e-tickets via a lucky draw on October 1, allowing winners to take a single trip at no cost.  

Children can have free journeys on most buses operated by KMB, Long Win Bus, Citybus and New Lantao Bus on the day. 

There will be free admission to museums managed by the Leisure and Cultural Services Department.

Use of various indoor and outdoor facilities run by the department will also be free, with places determined by ballot. 

Meanwhile, there will be no charge to enter Hong Kong Wetland Park and Sha Tin Racecourse, while discounted tickets will be on offer for attractions including the Ngong Ping 360 cable car and Ocean Park.

title: 海關接獲星薈相關舉報　如違反商品說明條例會採取執法行動
news_content:
多名準新人早前向尖沙咀婚宴酒家「星薈」支付5至10萬酒席訂金，但近日未能聯絡到酒樓負責人。海關回覆查詢表示，已接獲相關舉報，如發現違反《商品說明條例》情况，會採取適當執法行動。

海關提醒，購買服務後，應保留交易單據及相關紀錄，若日後需作出申訴，可作為基本資料，同時商戶必須遵守有關條例規定。

海關指出，根據《商品說明條例》，任何商戶接受付款時，如果意圖不供應有關服務或意圖供應與有關產品有重大分別的服務，或沒有合理理由相信能於指定或合理時間內供應有關服務，即屬違法。一經定罪，最高可被判罰款50萬元及監禁5年。

海關表示，非常重視保障消費者權益，市民若發現疑有商戶違反有關條例，可透過致電海關24小時熱線1828080等方式舉報。

title: 經優化的士筆試11月實施　陳美寶稱回應社會訴求及與時並進
news_content:
運輸及物流局局長陳美寶表示，當局建議日後申請的士和網約車駕駛資格的人士需要參與同一筆試，政府今年11月將實施經優化的士筆試，加入提升的士服務質素的相關內容，包括計分制試題等，同時回應社會訴求和與時並進，大幅減少地方和路線試題，希望做得更簡化，運輸署今日稍後交代詳情。

陳美寶在立法會有關網約車服務條例草案的委員會說，草案要求提供網約車服務的車輛必須展示標識，司機必須是登記車主，實施「人車綁定」的安排，避免市場衍生租賃市場，並加強堵絕黑工司機。

陳美寶又指，條例亦賦權運輸署署長就網約車許可證數目實施總量限制，避免供應過多，當局下一階段制訂限額時，會考慮香港實際情況、市民召車經驗、平台營運需要、公共交通生態和道路承載力等決定。

陳美寶強調，的士和網約車並非零和博奕，兩者各有優勢，可以共存互補，的士原有優勢不會因為規範網約車改變，希望規管網約車服務可為市民提供合法合規和多元化的選擇。

title: 國泰與香港迪士尼簽署合作備忘錄　擬明年推出過境旅客產品

title: Airport urged to go the distance, be more than a hub
news_content:
Secretary for Transport and Logistics Mable Chan on Tuesday called on the Airport Authority to further diversify services and expand its network to mark the centenary of Hong Kong's airport development.

A special exhibition was also launched to celebrate the occasion, with photographs showcasing milestones in the 100 years of Hong Kong's airport development and the switch in airport operations from Kai Tak to Chek Lap Kok forming an essential chapter in that storied history.

Speaking at the event, Chan noted that the airport has seen a tremendous  transformation over the years, with its network now linking up with 210 global destinations and Chek Lap Kok seeing over 53.1 million passengers each year.

But she noted that the airport has room to go "beyond merely being a transportation hub" – with its blueprint, unveiled this year, laying out a plan to become a premier travel landmark by developing the so-called "Skytopia.

Under the blueprint released in January, the airport aims to invest HK$100 billion to integrate commercial activities, culture, art trading, entertainment and leisure.

When completed, Skytopia will have a 500-berth marina for yachts, the city's largest water recreation area, a fresh market for high-end produce from around the world, as well as a cluster of offices, shops, hotels, and leisure facilities.

"I really hope that Hong Kong International Airport will go beyond being just a traditional transportation hub," Chan said.

"I hope it can be a place where residents and tourists can go to – not just to catch a flight but also to enjoy the arts or eat fresh seafood and other delicious cuisines, or attend concerts or even take trips on yachts. 

"Such things would make the airport a truly diversified international aviation hub," she added, noting that the airport shall also look into expanding its air network with emerging market destinations under the Belt and Road Initiative as well as those in South Asia and South America.

Her remarks also came as a new coach hall at the revamped second terminal of the Hong Kong International Airport is set to open next Tuesday, along with new shops and restaurants. 

Chan noted that the T2 terminal is expected to fully open in the second quarter of next year, following a phased opening of other facilities later on.

Chief executive Vivian Cheung said the authority is gearing up to host the 30th edition of "Routes World", a large-scale global aviation convention, next week.

During the three-day "Routes World 2025", which will take place in Hong Kong for the first time, some 2,500 delegates from about 250 airlines around the world will gather in the SAR to discuss latest developments in the aviation sector, strengthening Hong Kong's role as a leading aviation centre.

"[It's the first time officials from] all 90 global airports gather here, with representatives from over 115 countries worldwide. It's like an Olympic here... This signifies the international aviation industry's recognition of Hong Kong as a major aviation hub," Cheung said.

"We are confident that Hong Kong will continue to lead as a global aviation hub to serve passenger and business from around the world, as well as setting new standards for connectivity, sustainability and innovation," she added.

The convention will take place between September 24 and 26.

title: 中方強烈不滿及堅決反對美日在日部署堤豐中導系統

title: Banquet restaurant closure sparks wedding jitters
news_content:
Several brides and grooms-to-be have been left furious and worried that their wedding plans may go up in smoke after the apparent sudden closure of the restaurant they booked for their banquets.

Starry Terrace, under catering giant Super Star Group, is believed to have ceased operations, with labour officials reporting inquiries regarding unpaid wages and compensation over terminated contracts.

Six customers turned up at the banquet restaurant in Tsim Sha Tsui on Tuesday, saying they have paid between HK$70,000 and HK$100,000 for upcoming wedding meals there. 

A man surnamed Ho said he might have to cancel his wedding. 

“Last month, the staff were still telling us that they were working and our wedding could still go on. But these days, they just disappeared and we can’t find out who is responsible for this,” he said.

“We are having our wedding in November, and time is too tight, so we may have to delay our wedding first and find another place, we don’t know yet.” 

A woman surnamed Fung spoke of her fury at the restaurant's apparent abrupt closure.

“My wedding party is on November 29 this year, but now the restaurant is closed and there are no responses from the staff. So I’m very angry,” she said.

“We are very lucky we found another restaurant to continue the wedding party, but I know many other victims are finding it difficult to find a new restaurant.”

A woman surnamed Au told RTHK she just wants a refund.

“The most simple and direct way to solve the problem is for the restaurant to give us back our money. A few of us are having our wedding in November, which is two months away. Time is very tight,” she said. 

“We can just think we’re unlucky, having to find another venue for the wedding in a short amount of time. But the deposit we paid was also earned through blood and sweat, we just want our money back.”

The Labour Department said it had received requests for assistance from staff at the restaurant, adding that any other workers affected should get in touch. 

Customs officers also said they had received reports of the restaurant's closure and would look into whether there have been any violations of the Trade Descriptions Ordinance. 

Another restaurant belonging to the same group, Super Star Seafood Restaurant, shut down in July.

會展中心過去一年舉辦786項活動　逾780萬人次參與
news_content:
香港會議展覽中心去年7月至今年6月，共舉行786項活動，包括120個展覽、90個國際及本地會議，涵蓋主題包括加密貨幣、第三代互聯網、創新科技、金融科技、可持續發展、藝術、葡萄酒和烈酒、度假和旅遊、教育以及大灣區發展等。另外，數以百計企業會議、宴會和文娛活動在年內舉行。

會展管理公司董事總經理梅李玉霞指出，對過去一年的成績感到鼓舞及自豪，反映香港作為超級聯繫人的角色，而且舉辦國際活動的獨特優勢並未動搖。

title: 外交部促菲方停止侵權挑釁　勿挑戰中方維護自身合法權益堅定決心
news_content:
在北京，外交部發言人林劍表示，菲律賓派多艘公務船侵闖黃岩島領海，嚴重侵犯中方主權及權益，嚴重破壞海上和平穩定。中方依法採取必要措施，維護自身領土主權和海洋權益，無可非議。

林劍又說，事實再次證明，菲方在海上蓄意侵權挑釁是導致局勢緊張的根源，菲方應立即停止侵權挑釁，不要挑戰中方維護自身合法權益的堅定決心。

海警新聞發言人較早時表示，菲律賓組織10多艘公務船從不同方向非法侵闖中國黃岩島領海，中國海警依法對菲方船隻採取喊話警告、航路管制、水炮噴射等管制措施，批評菲方蓄意侵權挑釁行徑性質惡劣，發生擦碰的責任完全在菲方。

title: 聯合國調查報告指以色列對加沙實施種族滅絕　以方否認
news_content:
聯合國一個獨立調查委員會發表報告，指以色列自2023年10月起，對加沙地帶的巴勒斯坦人實施種族滅絕。

報告說，有理由相信加沙戰事爆發以來，以色列的行動犯下《防止及懲治滅絕種族罪公約》定義的4種種族滅絕行為，即殺害該團體的成員；致使該團體的成員在身體上或精神上遭受嚴重傷害；故意使該團體處於某種生活狀況下，以毀滅其全部或局部的生命；強制施行辦法，意圖防止該團體內的生育。

報告引述以色列領導人的言論以及以色列軍隊的行為模式，作為種族滅絕意圖的證據。

以色列外交部說，堅決拒絕接納報告，指內容歪曲事實，又指委員會3名專家，完全接納哈馬斯的謊言，無視哈馬斯殺害1200人，試圖在以色列實施種族滅絕。

title: 傳媒報道以軍對加沙城發動地面攻勢　多人死亡
news_content:
多個傳媒引述消息指，以色列軍方對加沙城發動地面攻勢，試圖全面佔領當地。加沙城一間醫院表示，最少有20人死亡，近百人受傷送院。

身處當地的記者表示，以軍不停向加沙城進行空襲和炮擊。

以色列國防部長卡茨在社交平台發文，指以色列正打擊恐怖分子基礎設施，為釋放人質和擊敗哈馬斯而戰，加沙正在焚燒。以軍不會退縮，直到任務完成。

以色列總理內塔尼亞胡上月下令軍方攻佔加沙城，他稱，加沙城是哈馬斯的據點。

title: 林芳正和小林鷹之宣布參選自民黨總裁
news_content:
日本內閣官房長官林芳正和前經濟安全保障擔當大臣小林鷹之，今日分別宣布參選自民黨總裁。

林芳正召開記者會，正式宣布參選。他說，將在政策中納入措施，讓工資加幅超過物價加幅的勢頭不停止。

小林鷹之在宣布參選的記者會上建議減稅，促進經濟增長。

另外，農林水產大臣小泉進次郎表示，已經向支持者表明參選決心，逐步推進相關工作。

自民黨前幹事長茂木敏充上星期已經率先宣布參選。前經濟安全保障擔當大臣高市早苗據報亦會在本周正式宣布參選决定。

日本多項最新民意調查顯示，高市早苗和小泉進次郎被視為今次選舉熱門人選。

title: 丘應樺稱世貿《漁業補貼協定》有助推動可持續發展漁業作業模式
news_content:
特區政府表示，歡迎世界貿易組織的《漁業補貼協定》在獲得三分之二世貿組織成員接納後，於日內瓦時間本月15日生效。

商務及經濟發展局局長丘應樺表示，這是世貿組織首份以環境可持續性為核心的協定，不僅標誌着海洋可持續發展邁進重要一步，亦彰顯世貿組織在應對全球關注的議題方面繼續發揮重要作用。《協定》規管世貿組織成員的漁業補貼，有助推動可持續發展的漁業作業模式，減輕對海洋及全球魚類資源造成的損害，長遠而言保障及改善漁民的營運環境。

《協定》於2022年6月世貿組織第十二次部長級會議上達成，訂定一套具約束力的多邊規則，禁止成員提供若干對漁業可持續性造成最大損害的補貼，即助長非法、未報告及無管制捕魚的補貼；與捕撈已受過度捕撈的魚類種群有關的補貼；以及提供予在無管轄公海捕魚的補貼。世貿組織成員亦同意就仍未達成共識的議題繼續進行談判，以進一步完善《協定》的規則。中國香港一直積極參與相關談判。

中國香港於2023年8月接納《協定》後，漁護署已根據《協定》對有關漁業補貼及支援計劃的指引和條件作適當調整，現時亦沒有不符合《協定》的補貼或支援計劃。

title: 港珠澳大橋開通以來總客量超過9000萬人次
news_content:
截至星期一，港珠澳大橋正式開通以來，經大橋珠海公路口岸往來粵港澳三地的旅客數量超過9000萬人次，車輛超過1868萬輛次。

新華社引述港珠澳大橋邊檢站數據顯示，港珠澳大橋客流車流保持強勁增長，今年客流已超過2120萬人次，按年增長19%，預計全年將首次突破3000萬人次。 　　

隨著內地赴港澳「個人遊」城市持續擴容，以及珠海市赴澳門旅遊「一周一行」等政策的落地實施，今年以來，經港珠澳大橋珠海公路口岸往來的內地旅客已超過901萬人次。至於經口岸出入境的港澳居民有超過1270萬人次，預計全年有望超過1800萬人次。

title: 逾千食肆及商戶提供國慶優惠　黃傑龍料消費與餐飲市道續回暖
news_content:
政府將與社會各界推出多項慶祝國慶的活動及特別優惠，其中超過1000間食肆及商戶國慶當日會提供餐飲優惠。

本身經營餐飲集團的優質旅遊服務協會主席黃傑龍說，過去數月消費市道包括餐飲業都有回暖跡象，預計十一假期有關趨勢會持續，希望整體市道較去年暢旺。

黃傑龍認為，市道好轉涉及多個因素，包括環球經濟穩定下來、美國關稅措施影響無預期大，加上股票市場暢旺，在財富效應下，對消費力有一定幫助。

他又說，過去幾年社會已形成慶祝國慶的氛圍，內地旅客亦有意欲來港，加上社會各界提供多項優惠，令節慶氣氛更濃烈，希望旅客數字及留港消費的市民都較去年多。生意額方面，黃傑龍認為，國慶最重要是人流多，大家開心，業界沒有特別統計生意額。

至於北上消費，黃傑龍說，已成為常態化，反而社會上有意見認為內地不少景點都很擠擁，香港既然有不同慶祝國慶的活動和優惠，會選擇留港消費。

title: 丘應樺稱要提升香港於全球經濟尤其法務服務及國際仲裁中心影響力
news_content:
粵港澳大灣區法律企業交流會在澳門舉行，澳門中聯辦副主任黄柳權出席啟動儀式。

商務及經濟發展局局長丘應樺致辭表示，港澳作為大灣區的核心城市，應充分利用擁有「一國兩制」的獨特優勢，推動國家和大灣區的經濟持續繁榮。

他認為，在CEPA框架下，香港企業和專業人士，包括法律界進入內地服務業市場門檻，今年已進一步降低，應當在各領域尤其法律、金融等加強協作，推動大灣區內的民商互動、實現資源共享，優勢互補等，亦可提升香港的國際競爭力，繼續發揮「超級聯繫人」的角色，吸引更多國際企業和投資者到香港及大灣區發展。在積極參與國際事務中，提升香港在全球經濟，尤其在法務服務和國際仲裁中心的影響力。

澳門法務局副局長邱顯哲代表行政法務司司長張永春致辭表示，粵港澳大灣區作為國家其中一個高度開放和經濟活力最強的區域，有重要戰略地位。在推動區內高質量發展過程，離不開高水平的法治保障，尤其是在涉外法治領域的系統性佈局和跨域協同創新，當中既是銜接國際規則的重要橋樑，更是維護國家主權、安全和發展利益的保護屏障。

他指出，在面對新形勢新要求下，區內應當加快構建與國際經貿規則相適應的法律服務體系，持續優化跨境爭議解決機制，不斷提升大灣區的法治軟實力和國際公信力，推進大灣區法治深度融合，離不開粵港澳三地凝聚共識、深化協作。

title: 陳美寶稱民航處與機管局會繼續拓展航空網絡
news_content:
運輸及物流局局長陳美寶說，擴建後的機場二號客運大樓T2，旅遊巴及交通運輸設施將於下星期開通，T2其他設施亦預計於明年如期啟用，讓市民和旅客體會嶄新出行體驗。

陳美寶出席「香港機場百年印記」展覽開幕禮致辭表示，香港國際機場現時連接超過210個航點，每年招待超過5310萬旅客，處理超過490萬公噸貨物，香港國際機場無論在客運及貨運方面，都已經成為世界領先的頂流機場。

她表示，民航處與機管局會繼續拓展航空網絡，包括一帶一路新興市場、歐美、南亞、南美等地的新航線，當局亦會透過「多式聯運」模式，在貨運方面連接大灣區市場。

title: 美國內布拉斯加州首次在奶牛群檢出H5N1禽流感病毒
news_content:

農業部在聲明表示，事件不會對消費者健康構成威脅，亦不會影響商業牛奶供應安全。當局提醒奶牛養殖場加強生物安全措施，防止禽流感傳播。

美國疾病控制和預防中心表示，目前在美國禽類和奶牛群中傳播的H5N1型禽流感病毒對公眾構成的風險較低，但與受感染禽類及哺乳動物有接觸的人群感染風險較高，應採取防護措施。

title: 康文署：國慶日開放多項康樂及文化設施給市民免費使用
news_content:
康文署將於十一國慶日開放多項康樂及文化設施給市民免費使用。

市民可於明日起至周六期間，透過「SmartPLAY康體通」以個人方式提交抽籤申請，每份申請最多可包括3個選項。電腦抽籤分配結果將於下星期二公布，SmartPLAY系統會通知用戶成功中籤的段節。如有剩餘段節，未在抽籤中獲分派免費段節或未曾抽籤的市民，可於本月25日起，透過SmartPLAY系統以先到先得方式，預訂剩餘的免費段節。不論透過抽籤或先到先得的方式，每人可獲分派最多一節免費的康樂設施。

使用公眾游泳池設施毋須申請，市民可於泳池開放時段前在泳池入口處排隊輪候，名額先到先得，額滿即止。康文署轄下的博物館及藝術空間均免費入場，但香港太空館天象廳節目除外；孫中山紀念館現正進行優化工程而暫停開放。

另外，為配合警方於下月1日國慶煙花匯演於尖沙咀海旁一帶實施的人群控制措施，香港藝術館及香港太空館當日將提早於下午5時休館。

title: 銀行公會與工總率團訪問越南　加強金融及跨境合作
news_content:
銀行公會與工業總會首次聯合組織海外代表團，率領逾40位銀行界及本地企業代表出訪越南河內，擴大東盟區內朋友圈。

訪問團在周日至今日，在越南拜訪了多個部門的高級官員及商會領袖，包括越南財政部、越南國家銀行、越南工商總會等，就區內跨境合作機遇交流，並參觀「越南—新加坡工業園區」，了解當地營商情況。訪問團亦舉辦商務午餐交流會，吸引逾140位香港及越南的金融界及商界領袖參與。

金管局總裁余偉文表示，香港的獨特優勢有助支持大中華企業拓展越南市場，並協助越南企業走出去；雙方在貿易投資、銀行、資本市場、綠色金融及金融科技等領域，深化合作前景廣闊。

銀行公會主席禤惠儀表示，越南是香港第二大東盟成員貿易夥伴，本港銀行業可滿足當地金融機構及企業對金融科技的需求，支持他們借助香港的經驗，開拓綠色債券及項目融資市場，加強跨境合作，帶動區內貿易往來發展。

工總主席林世豪形容，越南是進入東盟市場的重要門戶，期望透過連結香港的工業實力及金融專業、越南的發展機遇，為企業搭建合作橋樑。

title: HK's David Muoka gets another NBA shot with Brooklyn
news_content:
Hong Kong basketball player David Muoka has been given another shot at making an NBA roster, with the Brooklyn Nets signing the big man to a partially guaranteed contract on Tuesday.

The deal was published on the NBA's transactions website with no further details.

Multiple US media reports suggest that Muoka, 24, was signed to an Exhibit-10 contract - a non-guaranteed, minimum salary deal that is often used by NBA teams to bring in players to compete for a roster spot.

Muoka made history last October when he became the first player from Hong Kong to ink an NBA contract.

But the Portland Trail Blazers quickly waived him to send the center to its developmental team.

The 6-foot-10 center had previously spent a season with the Nets' own affiliate in the developmental G League, the Long Island Nets.

He most recently played for the Windy City Bulls in the G League, where he averaged 11.6 points, 9.9 rebounds and 2.1 blocks in 34 games.

Muoka played collegiately at both Lamar University and the University of Nevada, Las Vegas (UNLV), before going undrafted in the NBA Draft last year.

title: 林芳正和小林鷹之據報下午宣布參選自民黨總裁

title: 消息稱「指明潛逃者」侯中宇母親被帶警署協助調查

title: International school row must not affect teaching: CE
news_content:
Chief Executive John Lee said on Tuesday the quality of education and interests of students at Hong Kong International School should not be affected by its ongoing legal dispute and that the Education Bureau is closely monitoring the situation.

The operator of the school is being sued by a US-based church that co-founded the institution. The Lutheran Church–Missouri Synod has accused the school’s operator of serving only the rich and violating their operating agreement.

Lee said he had reminded the relevant parties that students’ rights should be safeguarded.

“In regard to the dispute involving an international school, this is now a subjudice matter, so I won't go into details," he said. 

"But the government's position is very clear: the standard of education cannot be affected. Students' rights cannot be affected. These two principles are most important and have been duly [conveyed] to the parties concerned.

“The relevant parties [should] take heed [of] these important principles. The Education Bureau will monitor this very closely and will [reiterate the emphasis to the parties concerned] that quality of education and students’ interests must be safeguarded. 

"One other thing they should do is to ensure that the parents and the students should be informed regularly of developments.”

title: 本周「超級央行周」　市場料美國及加拿大將減息
news_content:
本周被形容為「超級央行周」，多家主要央行議息。

加拿大央行率先在周三公布議息結果，市場預期將減息0.25厘，指標利率下調至2.5厘，之前3次都維持利率不變。

市場預期同樣會減息的美國聯儲局，將於本港時間周四凌晨宣布議息結果。但在議息前夕，參議院以48對47，通過由白宮經濟顧問委員會主席米蘭，接替早前辭職的庫格勒擔任聯儲局理事，趕及出席聯儲局今個星期一連兩日的政策會議，預料他將推動更大幅度減息。

另一方面，美國上訴法院駁回總統特朗普罷免另一名理事庫克的決定，意味她亦將出席聯儲局本月政策會議。

東亞銀行財富管理處高級投資策略師黃燕娥相信，米蘭加入議息行列，不會影響聯儲局減息的主軸，亦不影響聯儲局獨立性，但不排除會擴闊討論空間。市場將關注點陣圖和鮑威爾在記者會上的言論。

至於英倫銀行將在聯儲局之後公布議息結果，市場預期維持利率4厘不變。

市場亦估計，日本央行周五或連續第5次會議維持利率0.5厘不變。黃燕娥表示，如果聯儲局持續減息，日本央行就毋須加大力度部署加息。

title: Four arrested on suspicion of laundering HK$2.6bn
news_content:
Customs officers have arrested four people suspected of laundering around HK$2.6 billion over some 18 months from August, 2023.

Officers said on Tuesday that based on intelligence, they arrested three men and a woman, aged 25 to 56, in recent weeks.

The four are suspected of setting up some 50 bank accounts under three shell companies, with about 6,000 "suspicious transactions" identified.

Michael Ng, an investigator from the department's financial investigation bureau, said the money went in and out of bank accounts of other firms, including some reported to be involved in the seafood and watch businesses.

"None of these transactions bear any relation to the suspects' three companies, making the dealings suspicious," Ng told reporters at a briefing.

"Also, the substantial sums going in and out of the bank accounts far exceed their declared taxable income. These incongruities further heightens the suspicion surrounding these transactions."

Officers seized a number of mobile phones, computers and bank cards in the operation, and froze around HK$2.5 million worth of assets under the suspects' names.

All four were released on bail pending further investigation.

title: Govt urged to ramp up AI education
news_content:
The Hong Kong Federation of Education Workers on Tuesday put forward suggestions regarding data education in schools, a day before Chief Executive John Lee was set to deliver his next policy address.

The ideas include a solid blueprint for artificial intelligence (AI) education, and training on the ethical use of AI. 

The federation's vice-president, Lawrence Tang, said data education should begin in primary school, with material about AI added to information technology lessons.

He added that resources should be allocated for an AI platform specifically tailored to education.

Ray Cheung, the federation's vice-chairman, said the government ought to be more proactive when it comes to AI.

"We believe the government, internally, they need to have a policy and influence the whole society not only in the education sector but also in other sectors," he said. 

"We believe this is very crucial and important for a better Hong Kong."

title: Same-sex issue 'very properly handled by all sides'
news_content:
Chief Executive John Lee on Tuesday stressed that the judicial, executive and legislative branches have "very properly" fulfilled their functions as required under the Basic Law in handling the issue of same-sex partnerships in Hong Kong.

He said the administration will explore ways to offer protection to people in such relationships after lawmakers last week voted down its proposed framework to recognise same-sex partnerships, which was drawn up in response to a landmark Court of Final Appeal ruling in 2023.

Speaking ahead of the weekly Executive Council meeting, Lee said the court has made a judgement free from interference, the administration has respected the rule of law and proposed legislation, and Legco has scrutinised the government bill concerned.

Lee said lawmakers reflect the views of their constituents when making decisions.

“There have been some very unfair criticisms about the Legislative Council – that it is a rubber stamp," he said. 

"That is a very unfair accusation. And the fact that they have exercised their duties and vote to represent their own thinking and the views from their constituencies reflect that Legco members are dutifully fulfilling their duty.” 

Lee said that the government would continue to examine how protection could be offered to same-sex partners.

“Same-sex partnership is a contentious issue in Hong Kong and that is why there have been a lot of views expressed both in society and in Legco,” he said.

“One thing is very clear. The only marriage that is recognized under the Basic Law law is heterosexual – man and female and one to one. 

"That principle hasn't changed and will not be changed. We will, of course, examine how we can offer protection to the same-sex partners so that their rights will be protected. 

"A lot of these relates to healthcare and also to estate properties. We will examine how we can do that administratively.”

title: 遭金屬枝擊傷城巴司機仍留院　公司稱有反映公路雜物促及時清理
news_content:
城巴昨日下午5時許發生罕見意外，一輛由金鐘往天水圍的967號線巴士，當駛至青朗公路時，突然被一條外來鐵枝擊中車頭擋風玻璃，並插進車長駕駛位置，司機受輕傷，目前留院治理。城巴表示，經初步調查，跌在公路的金屬枝長超過1米，懷疑被其他途徑的車輛輾起而擊中巴士。

城巴企業事務經理于雋說，高速公路行車快，如有障礙物，不論大小，一旦被輾起，擊中任何車輛都是非常危險。公司一向有與相關單位跟進反映，當高速公路有雜物都需要及時清理，昨日事件是亮起警號，這不單是為確保車長安全，作為公共交通的巴士，對乘客安全都非常重要。

他表示，公司非常關注同事在工作期間受傷，亦與有關單位跟進事件，城巴路線遍佈港九新界，一些近山路線，不時會出現樹枝跌落，又或在堆填區附近，會有可能從垃圾車或密斗車跌在路面的雜物，今次事件屬罕見。

于雋說，受傷車長熟悉所駕駛的967號線，感謝對方危急關頭展現敬業精神，儘管受傷仍先安全停下巴士，確保乘客安全，對車長行為深感敬佩，幸好車長只受皮外傷。

title: Deepening reform among themes of Policy Address: CE
news_content:
Chief Executive John Lee on Tuesday said deepening reform will be among the themes of this year's Policy Address that he will deliver on Wednesday. 

The cover of the blueprint's booklet will be green again, he said, adding that this represents vibrancy and continuity.

The CE said the choice of colour also indicates that government policies and the SAR's vitality will continue, for a better tomorrow.

"The theme this year is to deepen reform, taking care of people's livelihood, and then we could leverage on our advantage and build a better future," he said.

"We will still focus on the economy and improve people's livelihood. Because that's been my philosophy over the years – that is we need to develop the economy and improve people's livelihood."

More than 40 consultations sessions were held in recent months for Lee to seek the views of the public.

He said the administration has received over 10,000 submissions from various channels, and thanked people for expressing their opinions.

The CE added that there are short, medium and long term policies in his fourth policy blueprint.

title: 許正宇：香港明年起從葡萄牙的「稅務黑名單」剔除
news_content:
財經事務及庫務局局長許正宇表示，香港由明年1月1日起，從葡萄牙的「稅務黑名單」剔除，為香港投資者消除不必要的稅務障礙，在更公平營商環境下，在當地發掘商機。

許正宇在社交平台發文指，香港投資者毋須再在葡萄牙繳付較高的預扣稅及房產稅，房產稅減省稅負最高可達7.2%；可以就某些非居民資本收益稅享有稅務豁免，最高可節省28%；香港與葡萄牙之間的交易不再受嚴格的轉讓定價規則規管。

他指，今次成果有賴商界與財庫局通力合作，共同向葡萄牙政府作出有理有據的解說，說好香港的「稅務故事」。政府會繼續支持國際稅務合作，與海外稅務管轄區保持緊密溝通，積極擴展稅收協定網絡，以進一步鞏固香港作為國際領先商業和投資樞紐的地位。

news_content:
美國參議院以些微優勢確認白宮經濟顧問委員會主席米蘭，將接任聯儲局理事。

由共和黨控制的參議院以48對47票通過任命，一旦完成書面程序及宣誓就職，米蘭將會出席聯儲局由星期二開始一連兩日的政策會議。

米蘭在聯儲局的任期明年1月底屆滿，原本在白宮的職位將會保留。

分析預料，米蘭將對減息25個基點投反對票，並支持更大幅度減息。

米蘭曾表示，相信特朗普政府高額進口關稅不會導致通脹，並認為打擊移民等其他政策，將減少住房需求，紓和廣泛的物價壓力。

另外，美國上訴法院駁回總統特朗普罷免聯儲局理事庫克的決定，意味著她將出席聯儲局9月政策會議。

title: 施政報告2025｜消息稱政府拆牆鬆綁招產業進北都　可直接批地
news_content:
行政長官李家超明日發表任內第四份《施政報告》，消息指其中重點是加快發展北都，政府會「拆牆鬆綁」，精簡規劃及行政等流程，便利產業進駐。

據了解，當局接獲內地及海外不同企業表示有興趣落戶北都，如有企業急於進駐香港，當局建議可考慮北都範圍的使用現有工業用地例如元朗創新園、粉嶺、大埔工業用地，或先落戶科學園及數碼港等，其後才搬進北都產業用地。

消息透露，北都產業用地用途具彈性，例如汽車製造業亦屬於先進製造業，可使用創科用地。產業用地亦可以不同模式批出，若透過招標，可採取「雙信封制」一即同時考慮地價及其他有關因素；當局亦可考慮選取特定行業「有限度投標」，亦不排除「直接批地」。

對於有建議成立類似西九管理局或機管局的法定機構營運北都，消息指出，北都整體面積相當於香港的三分一，難以交由一個機構營運，當局傾向由政府成立和牽頭的公司建設和營運個別產業園區。

身兼行政會議成員的商界立法會議員林健鋒接受本台訪時表示，最近不少海內外人士向他查詢，如何參與香港科研等發展，當中包括龍頭企業。他認為，北都是將科研成果轉化及「落地」的重要基地，適合發展汽車製造業等，期望《施政報告》宣布有具規模項目落戶，他亦對此有信心。

為吸引高端及高新科技等企業進駐，林健鋒建議政府彈性處理有關審批程序、甚至「特事特辦」，例如不一定透過傳統方式賣地，可配對企業需要作特別批地，他說，若未來五年陸續有企業落戶，日後經濟效益可達數以百億計。

本地初創食品科技企業IXON Food Technology始創人兼行政總裁張文浩表示，由於公司總部設於香港，有意進駐北都設立廠房及生產線，認為食品科技發展潛力及需求大，亦可帶動相關產業鏈，創新亦環保。這間企業研發出「先進低溫真空無菌包裝」ASAP技術，可以令食物在室溫保存兩年，味道及營養不變。最近亦與本地一間包裝物料公司研發以植物纖維製造膠膜及飯盒。

張文浩預計，11月開始設立全港首條全自動生產線，產量目標為每日一噸、即約5千至1萬件產品，包括點心、炒飯、軟餐、寵物食品等，主要傾銷往內地及東南亞。他說，過去十年共投放500萬美金做研發，希望當局提供更多資金管道，協助將科研成果「落地」，並簡化有關申請程序。

香港中華廠商聯合會早前就《施政報告》向特首提交建議，包括倡議在北都設立「香港食品產業園」，集合食品科技研發、中試、檢測認證及生產。身兼廠商會副會長的香港食品及飲品行業總會主席黃家和表示，到過中東及內地不同城市考察，不少大型企業看中香港聯通國際的優勢，但對本港市場認識不深，亦不太清楚本港整體發展方向。

黃家和認為，政府要加強宣傳北都發展，講解本港相關優惠政策，亦可參考內地工業園運作經驗，做好區內運輸物流配套及宣傳，可令新型工業急促增長，帶來一定的經濟效益。

title: Prayers on the go: HK's Muslim-friendly shift
news_content:
In the tight quarters of a budget hostel at Chungking Mansions in Tsim Sha Tsui, Rawdhah Paiz and her friends carefully spread their prayer mats across the bed — forced to improvise by their humble accommodations.
 
"Since there's no space in this room, my friends have to pray on the bed," the Malaysian university lecturer and part-time travel vlogger said with a laugh in her YouTube video.

Like Paiz, many Muslim travellers often experience the difficulty of finding a proper venue for salah, or ritual prayers which are performed multiple times every day, even on vacation. 


From Japan, Australia and China, to more recently South Korea and Thailand, Paiz has no shortage of recommendations on scenic landscapes or authentic local dishes.

But what often goes unseen is the quiet effort to find a clean, private place to pray. 
 
As a practising Muslim, Paiz performs five prayers a day, but she squeezes it down to three sessions while travelling.

Still, the question remained during her five-day trip to Hong Kong in July last year: where should she and her friends pray?

Seeking out local mosques is one option. Others, like Paiz, make do with their hostel rooms.

"It doesn't matter where we go, we could pray anywhere," she said.

Location aside, Muslims must adhere to several requirements. 

They must face the direction towards the Kaaba, the sacred structure at the heart of Islam's holiest mosque in Mecca. The space should also be clean, and before they start praying, they have to cleanse their body in a ritual called wudu.

Paiz recalled one time in Australia when she ended up praying in a fitting room of a clothing store.

"It works, although it's not ideal," she said. "I mean, in theory, in practical terms... yeah, it's not that clean. So that's why we bring a mat — we pray on the mat. I'll always carry mine. When I pray, especially if I have to sit on the floor, I don't sit directly on it — the mat goes down first."

Even finding a place to perform wudu can be tricky.

"In a non-Muslim country, like Australia for example, I wanted to pray but there was no place to take ablution," she said. "So I went to the female toilet, and of course I had to take off my scarf, wash myself — and yeah, some women would look at me like, 'What are you doing?' You know, give me that look. But I just... you know, whatever. I'm just doing my own thing."

She said designating a small, quiet room for prayers can make all the difference for Muslim travellers.
 
"Of course, it will be cool to have many prayer facilities, right? It will be easier for us, for all Muslims."

A City Making Progress


Not long ago, prayer spaces in Hong Kong were few and far between. That's slowly changing -- especially since Chief Executive John Lee pledged in his Policy Address last year to attract more Muslim visitors.

The Hong Kong Tourism Board has since partnered with CrescentRating, a global accreditation body for Muslim-friendly travel. 

The number of hotels earning Muslim-friendly accreditation jumped from 39 to 62 in just one year, a 59 percent boost.

On a scale of one to seven, most establishments received a score of three - indicating a basic level of services catering to Muslim guests. Eight hotels were awarded a score of five.


CrescentRating founder and CEO, Fazal Bahardeen, explained they looked at several factors such as the environment and services. One key attribute, he said, is prayer accessibility.

"For example, do they provide prayer direction markers in hotel rooms?" he said. "We also look at whether the washrooms are water-friendly — because Muslims perform ablution, or wudu, before each prayer."

Hotels with higher scores often provide prayer rugs, Qurans, and halal-certified meals. Bahardeen said they also plan to accredit more attractions, malls, and conference venues, while educating the industry on the needs of Muslim travellers.

"People have misunderstandings. They think it's some kind of religious travel, which is not. It's leisure travel. It's just trying to solve their day-to-day needs," he said. "Education is really key in terms of understanding the needs and catering to this market."

Despite the learning curve, Bahardeen believes Hong Kong’s progress has been impressive.

"We started with the [hotel accreditation] programme around last May and June. It has been really a very amazing progress that Hong Kong has done within a very short time," he said.

A Growing Network of Prayer Spaces


It's not just hotels which are eyeing a slice of the pie. Major attractions and venues have all taken steps to calibrate their guest experience for Muslims.

Hong Kong Disneyland now offers halal meal options at its certified restaurants, coupled with prayer and wudu facilities.


Ngong Ping Village near the Big Buddha offers separate prayer rooms for men and women, complete with amenities such as prayer mats, Qurans and direction markers, while garments are offered for female guests if needed.

Ablution facilities, water-friendly washrooms, and a Halal-certified Middle Eastern restaurant are also available.

At Hong Kong International Airport, multi-faith prayer rooms spread across the terminals are open round the clock. These rooms include Qibla direction markers and ablution basins.


The Global Picture

All these efforts by Hong Kong's tourism trade didn't go unnoticed. In the latest Global Muslim Travel Index by CrescentRating, the city was named the "most promising" Muslim-friendly destination, and one of the top three non-Muslim-majority markets.

Bahardeen noted Muslims are one of the fastest-growing demographic segments in global tourism. According to Crescent Rating, the number of outbound Muslim visitors is projected to grow to 245 million by 2030, a 39 percent surge compared to 2024.

Bahardeen urged cities like Hong Kong to focus their efforts on high-traffic places like shopping malls and tourist attractions.

"It's not like trying to set up a mosque on a street — that's a lot more difficult," he said. "Setting up a prayer room in a shopping mall or attraction is much easier."

"You really need only a very small, very small room for a prayer place," he added. "Two metres by two meters would do, actually — just enough for somebody to go and pray, you know."

A Good Start


Paiz also acknowledged the city's efforts to become more accommodating to Muslim travellers.

"Of course there's still room for improvement, but honestly it's a good start," she said.

"I'll give [my trip in Hong Kong] an 85 (out of 100). Overall, we had a good experience. The people are nice. That's why if I have the opportunity, I will go back again."

In a world where small gestures go a long way, offering a quiet and clean space to pause and pray — even for just a few minutes — might just be enough to make Muslim travellers feel genuinely welcomed.

title: 中美就解決TikTok問題達成基本框架共識
news_content:
中美結束一連兩日在西班牙馬德里的經貿會談，就解決TikTok問題達成基本框架共識。國務院副總理何立峰表示，中方堅決維護國家利益和海外中資企業的合法權益。對於TikTok問題，中方會依法依規審批技術出口。商務部國際貿易談判代表兼副部長李成鋼強調，中方絕不會以犧牲原則立場、企業利益和國際公平正義為代價，尋求達成任何協議。

美國財長貝森特說，框架協議旨在實現TikTok轉為美方控股，協議會保留TikTok的中國特色。他說，美方威脅關閉TikTok在美業務，促使中方放棄美方要在關稅和技術出口管制讓步的要求，令雙方達成框架協議。他又證實，總統特朗普將於星期五與中國國家主席習近平通話，商定協議具體細節。

title: 東京羽田機場一名安檢人員涉偷取旅客現金被捕
news_content:
日本東京羽田機場一名安檢人員，涉嫌偷取旅客放在手提行李輸送帶上的現金被捕。

共同社報道，涉案的21歲男子上星期六傍晚在國內航班安檢區域，涉嫌偷走一名30多歲旅客放在托盤上的9萬日圓紙幣，這名旅客發現不見了現金後，向其他安檢人員報告，警方翻查閉路電視後，發現這名負責分流的疑犯假扮整理行李托盤偷走現金，再將現金藏在洗手間的廁紙芯內。

警方說，疑犯承認在8月前後開始犯案達七十至八十次，累計竊取約150萬日圓，並表示是為了尋求刺激。

title: 納指及標指齊創新高　Alphabet破頂　市值升穿3萬億美元
news_content:
美股上升，納指及標普500指數創新高。Tesla及Google母公司Alphabet造好，帶動投資氣氛。市場等待本周聯儲局的議息會議。

納斯達克指數一度升至22352點，收報22348點，升207點，升幅0.94%。

標準普爾500指數曾升至6619點，收報6615點，升30點，升幅0.47%。

道瓊斯指數反覆靠穩，收報45883點，升49點，升幅0.11%。

Tesla一度升近8%，收市升近4%，文件顯示，行政總裁馬斯克上周五斥資近10億美元增持公司股票。Alphabet升逾4%創新高，市值突破3萬億美元。

Nvidia偏軟收市，中國市場監管總局調查公司違反《反壟斷法》。

title: S&P 500, Nasdaq hit new highs ahead of Fed rate call
news_content:
Wall Street stocks gained on Monday with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq reaching new records on hopes that the US Federal Reserve will cut interest rates at its policy meeting this week.

Positive signals from US-China economic talks in Madrid also bolstered sentiment.

The Dow Jones edged up 0.1 percent to 45,883, while the S&P 500 Index added 0.5 percent to 6,615.

The Nasdaq jumped 0.9 percent to 22,348.

The movements came as investors maintain expectations that the Fed will make its first rate cut of 2025 at the end of its two-day gathering on Wednesday, as officials move to shore up the economy while the labour market weakens.

The market will likely be in "wait-and-see" mode ahead of the rate decision, said Art Hogan of B Riley Wealth Management.

Importantly, investors will be trying to work out if the central bank is starting a cycle of rate cuts or if it makes a one-off reduction, he said.

Meanwhile, top economic officials from Washington and Beijing also said on Monday that they have reached a framework deal to resolve their dispute over TikTok – as a deadline approaches for the app to find a non-Chinese buyer or face a US ban.

Tesla shares climbed 3.6 percent after CEO Elon Musk disclosed his purchase of around US$1 billion in shares of the electric vehicle company. (AFP)

title: 馬來西亞連日暴雨引發洪災　沙巴州至少12死
news_content:
馬來西亞多處連日暴雨引發洪災，沙巴州至少12人死亡、數人失蹤。

馬新社報道，沙巴州星期一晚的暴雨，在首府哥打基納巴盧附近一處村莊引發山泥傾瀉，一座位於山坡邊的木屋被沖毀，一家11口被埋，其中7人遇難。當日另外兩宗山泥傾瀉亦各有兩人喪生。加上洪災初期報告的一名遇難者，當地死亡人數增至12人。

當局說，全國共有5個州受災，超過2200名民眾被轉移至救災中心，其中沙巴州就有超過1800人被疏散。

總理安華表示，政府已緊急撥款用於援助災民、修復重要基礎設施及支持災後重建，他呼籲全國團結一致，攜手幫助受災民眾。

title: 以總理不排除再打擊哈馬斯領導層　美卿將訪卡塔爾重申支持主權
news_content:
以色列總理內塔尼亞胡表明，不排除對哈馬斯領導人採取進一步打擊的可能，不論他們身處在什麼地方。

內塔尼亞胡在耶路撒冷與到訪的美國國務卿魯比奧出席記者會時表示，每個國家都有權在境外保衛自己。被問及美國是否參與以色列對卡塔爾首都多哈的襲擊，內塔尼亞胡重申，行動是由以色列自己決定。

魯比奧強調，結束加沙戰事的唯一途徑是哈馬斯釋放所有人質並投降。他說，雖然美國希望透過外交途徑結束戰爭，但必須為無法實現這個目標的可能做好準備。他又重申，華盛頓與海灣國家盟友保持牢固關係。

魯比奧今日將會轉到卡塔爾訪問，美國國務院表示，魯比奧屆時會重申美國對卡塔爾安全和主權的支持。

title: 特朗普下令打擊駛往美國的委內瑞拉販毒集團船隻　造成3人死亡
news_content:
美國總統特朗普表示，美軍星期一上午根據他的命令，在國際水域針對一艘駛往美國的委內瑞拉販毒集團船隻，實施軍事打擊，造成三名恐怖份子死亡。

特朗普在社交平台發文說，這些極度暴力的販毒集團，對美國國家安全、外交政策和美國重大利益構成威脅。

美軍本月初亦在南加勒比海襲擊一艘從委內瑞拉出發的運毒船，打死船上11人，委內瑞拉批評美軍的行動是未經法定程序的謀殺。

委內瑞拉總統馬杜羅星期一批評，美國政府正試圖為對委內瑞拉發動的犯罪攻擊，尋找正當理由，形容近期的事件是一場徹頭徹尾的侵略，又說與美國政府的溝通已經切斷。

title: 波蘭摧毀在政府大樓及總統府上空的無人機　英國戰機保衛北約東翼
news_content:
波蘭總理圖斯克在社交媒體表示，國家保護局摧毀一架在政府大樓及總統府上空飛行的無人機，兩名白俄羅斯公民被拘留，警方正調查事件詳情。

另外，英國政府宣布，在俄羅斯無人機上星期進入波蘭領空之後，英國戰機將會加入北約在波蘭上空執行防空行動，以應對包括無人機等來自俄羅斯的空中威脅，協助保衛北約東翼。

俄羅斯聯邦安全會議副主席梅德偉傑夫表示，如果烏克蘭和北約國家在烏設立禁飛區、北約成員國擊落俄羅斯無人機，將意味北約與俄羅斯之間的戰爭。

title: 貝森特：美國威脅關閉TikTok促使中方達成框架協議
news_content:
中美團隊結束一連兩日在西班牙的經貿會談，就解決TikTok問題達成基本框架共識。國務院副總理何立峰表示，中方堅決維護國家利益和海外中資企業的合法權益，對於TikTok問題，中方會依法依規展開技術出口審批。商務部國際貿易談判代表兼副部長李成鋼強調，中方絕不會以犧牲原則立場、企業利益和國際公平正義為代價，尋求達成任何協議。

美國財長貝森特表示，美國威脅關閉TikTok在美業務，促使中方談判代表放棄美方要在關稅和技術出口管制讓步的要求，令雙方達成框架協議。他說，美方對協議中涉及國家安全的內容非常滿意，協議條款將會保留TikTok的中國特色。他又說，下一輪美中談判很可能在11月10日前，即是兩國關稅休戰協議限期屆滿前舉行，暫緩關稅措施亦可能再次延長90日。

路透社引述消息人士表示，說服中方的另一個因素是美方團隊發出信息，如果今次會談未能達成TikTok框架協議，總統特朗普與中國國家主席習近平今年秋季或無法會晤。

title: 柯克被槍殺案　包裹步槍毛巾經DNA比對與疑犯羅賓遜吻合
news_content:
美國執法部門繼續調查知名保守派活動人士柯克被槍殺的案件，聯邦調查局局長帕特爾表示，在案發現場附近發現、用作包裹涉案步槍的毛巾，以及在開槍地點屋頂檢獲的螺絲批，經DNA比對與疑犯羅賓遜吻合。帕特爾接受霍士新聞訪問時又提到，在羅賓遜家中發現一張撕毀的字條，提到要殺死柯克。

羅賓遜預計本周被起訴加重謀殺、妨礙司法公正和重罪開槍罪。猶他州州長考克斯日前表示，羅賓遜一直拒絕與調查人員合作，至今未有承認犯案。

title: 王毅冀波蘭為推動歐盟樹立客觀理性對華認知發揮積極作用
news_content:
轉到華沙訪問的中共中央政治局委員、外長王毅，與波蘭總統納夫羅茨基及副總理兼外長西科爾斯基會談。

王毅向納夫羅茨基表示，中方願與波方繼續深化戰略互信，增進戰略合作，共同推動中波全面戰略伙伴關係不斷向前發展。希望波方為推動歐盟樹立客觀理性對華認知發揮積極作用。

王毅與西科爾斯基會晤時說，波蘭是今次歐洲之行最後一站，過去幾日與歐洲朋友廣泛交流，對當前歐洲面臨的挑戰感同身受。濫施關稅違反國際貿易規則，損害各國正當利益，中歐應共同予以抵制反對。面對單邊霸凌，妥協沒有出路，為虎作倀終將損害自身利益。國際情勢越是複雜動盪，中波和中歐越要秉持建交初心，堅持夥伴定位，加強團結協作，維護自身正當權益及國際公平正義。

王毅又闡述中方在烏克蘭危機方面勸和促談的原則立場，支持一切有利於和平的努力，指中方願意繼續與波方等相關各方密切溝通，推動達成全面、持久、有約束力的和平協議，構建均衡、有效、可持續的歐洲安全框架，實現歐洲的長治久安。希望波蘭作為歐洲重要國家，從自身和歐洲根本長遠利益出發，為推動危機政治解決發揮建設性作用。

title: 阿拉伯－伊斯蘭國家強烈譴責以色列襲擊卡塔爾
news_content:
阿拉伯－伊斯蘭國家召開緊急峰會，強烈譴責以色列襲擊卡塔爾的侵略行為，堅決拒絕任何對以色列侵略行為的辯護，拒絕以色列威脅再次襲擊卡塔爾的言論。

峰會由卡塔爾國家元首塔米姆主持，來自阿拉伯國家聯盟和伊斯蘭合作組織成員國的國家元首、政府首腦或代表出席。

會後聯合聲明表示，與會國家與卡塔爾共同對抗以色列的侵略行為，對卡塔爾的襲擊被視為對所有阿拉伯和伊斯蘭國家的侵略，並全力支持卡塔爾為應對這次襲擊而採取的一切應對措施。

聲明批評，以色列的野蠻襲擊破壞地區和平前景，對斡旋方和中立調節場所的襲擊，是對外交努力的公然挑釁，破壞國際斡旋進程。

title: 特朗普今日起國事訪問英國　警方稱已為可能發生的意外情況做準備
news_content:
美國總統特朗普今日起國事訪問英國，有美方官員表示，兩國將會簽署總值過百億美元的科技協議。

今次是特朗普繼2019年之後第二次國事訪問英國，星期三將會前往倫敦以西的溫莎堡，與英王查理斯三世會面並出席國宴，星期四就會轉到位於契克斯的首相鄉郊別墅，與英國首相施紀賢會談。

特朗普此行正值他的政治盟友、右翼活動人士柯克上星期被人槍殺，預計溫莎會有大量人群聚集，有示威者表明希望表達反對特朗普的聲音。

英國警方表示，已制定一項非常全面的警務及保安行動，為所有可能發生的意外情況做好準備，屆時會有大量警力駐守，溫莎和契克斯的空域亦會關閉。

title: 尖沙咀「星薈」據報停業　勞工處接獲僱員求助　海關亦接獲舉報
news_content:
有報道指，位於尖沙咀的食肆星薈突然暫停營業。勞工處回覆查詢時說，接獲有關僱員求助，主要涉及欠薪及解僱補償，呼籲如果有僱員被拖欠工資及其他僱傭權益，應盡快聯絡勞工處勞資關係科分區辦事處，處方會提供適切協助。

海關就指，已接獲相關舉報，若發現有違反《商品說明條例》的情况，會採取適當的執法行動。

title: 城巴擋風玻璃遭鐵棒擊穿事件　一名貨車司機涉駕駛危險車輛被捕
news_content:
一架城巴昨日下午在大欖轉車站附近，被一支長約73厘米的鐵棒擊中擋風玻璃，插向駕駛座，司機胸口擦傷，清醒送院，警方以涉嫌駕駛危險車輛拘捕一名貨車男司機。

事發在昨日下午5時許，涉事的967號線城巴沿大欖隧道往元朗方向行駛，警方初步調查相信，一支鐵棒較早時從一架重型貨車的後方跌下，並擊中尾隨的一輛私家車。

城巴表示，初步調查顯示金屬枝在公路懷疑被其他途經車輛輾起，擊中巴士車頭擋風玻璃及車長駕駛座位，對於有員工受傷深表關注，會與有關單位跟進，確保及時移除路面安全隱患。
